alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hickory; Laclede; Miller; Polk; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 13 at 8:52AM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Camden, Hickory, Miller and Pulaski. In southwest Missouri, Dallas, Greene, Laclede and Polk. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 852 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Wet Glaize at Carrol Cave Road, Lindley Creek at Mathis Road, Little Niangua at County Road 66, Dry Auglaize Creek at Freedom Ridge Road and Little Niangua at County Road 200. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bolivar, Osage Beach, Camdenton, Buffalo, Hermitage, Lake Ozark, Pleasant Hope and Fair Play. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Greene; Hickory; Laclede; Miller; Polk; Pulaski
